title: Beard & Mustache Trimmer
description: Cordless operation with two AA batteries (not included), hair length adjustments via adjustable guide comb. Stainless steel blades hold maximum sharpness over an extended period of time.

title: Panasonic Single Line Telephone
description: People who wish to have a simple, yet convenient-to-use phone around the house can consider getting this Panasonic single line 2.4GHz telephone. The phone is a great option for office or home use and offers the portability of a mobile phone. This phone has a caller ID that helps you identify the caller before you answer the call. It is available in the solid shade of black and comes with a stylish base in matching color that looks good on any surface.

title: Panasonic HC-MDH2M Full HD Camcorder
description: One SD card slot and built-in 32GB memory drive for video storage. In-built microphone and external camera mounting microphone provided. 3.50x intelligent zoom and 21x optical zoom with 28mm wide angle. High sensitivity sensor.

title: Insta360 ONE X
description: The Insta360 ONE X, a follow-up to the original Insta360 ONE, is Wi-Fi-enabled and capable of syncing to your iOS or Android device remotely, instead of having to be physically connected to your phone/tablet as is the case with the original. The Insta360 ONE X captures up to 5.7K resolution 360 video at 30 fps and 18MP photos. Two 200° lenses, accompanied by two built-in mics, capture your surroundings from all angles to a microSD card (sold separately).

title: GoPro HERO 12 Black Action Camera
description: 27MP with Improved Performance, 5.3K60/4K120/2.7K240 Video, 27MP Photos. HyperSmooth 6.0 Image Stabilization, Front and Rear LCD Screens. Bluetooth Audio Connectivity and Control. 33′ Waterproof without Housing. 8x Slow-Motion Video. 1720mAh Capacity Rechargeable Battery.

title: Kent R Series Nest of Table Set
description: Kent R Series Nest of Table Set
